name: Fancy Ball
description:
This game is made by indie developer who is working under the name Yupi Games. Mission is to collect all coins with ball and open and discover another levels. Enjoy in great graphic, animations, sounds. Relax with sound of waves and beautiful trees.

You can help my work by donations, they are not required but they are most appreciate! Thank you!

Visit Yupi Games on Facebook and find more free games:https://www.facebook.com/pages/Yupi-Games/286578011548312?ref=aymt_homepage_panel

Try some free cool games for android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/developer?id=Yupi+Games
